00014 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( pst_simple1 )
00015 {
00016         PriorityNode* node = new PriorityNode();
00017         AlwaysRunning* ar = new AlwaysRunning();
00018         node->addChild(ar);
00019         int dummy_agent = 0;
00020         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00021         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00022         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent),BT_RUNNING);
00023         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00024         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00025         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00026         delete node;
00027 }

00029 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( pst_simple2 )
00030 {
00031         PriorityNode* node = new PriorityNode();
00032         node->addChild(new FailureAfter(1));
00033         node->addChild(new FailureAfter(1));
00034         node->addChild(new SuccessAfter(1));
00035         int dummy_agent = 0;
00036         for (int i = 0 ; i <2 ; i++)
00037         {
00038         node->init(&dummy_agent);
00039         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00040         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent),BT_RUNNING);
00041         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 0);
00042         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00043         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 1);
00044         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_RUNNING);
00045         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, 2);
00046         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->execute(&dummy_agent), BT_SUCCESS);
00047         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(node->currentPosition, -1);
00048         }
00049 
00050         delete node;
00051 }
